## auth.UserMetadata interface

Interface representing a user's metadata.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface UserMetadata 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [creationTime](./firebase-admin.auth.usermetadata.creationtime.md) | string | The date the user was created, formatted as a UTC string. |
|  [lastRefreshTime](./firebase-admin.auth.usermetadata.lastrefreshtime.md) | string \| null | The time at which the user was last active (ID token refreshed), formatted as a UTC Date string (eg 'Sat, 03 Feb 2001 04:05:06 GMT'). Returns null if the user was never active. |
|  [lastSignInTime](./firebase-admin.auth.usermetadata.lastsignintime.md) | string | The date the user last signed in, formatted as a UTC string. |
